snippet: Syracuse on Wednesday announced a self-imposed one-year postseason ban for its men’s basketball team because of an ongoing N.C.A.A. investigation.
abstract: College Basketball Roundup; Syracuse announces self-imposed one-year postseason ban for its men's basketball team because of ongoing NCAA investigation into drug and academic violations; men's and women's scores are noted.
lead_paragraph: Syracuse on Wednesday announced a self-imposed one-year postseason ban for its men’s basketball team because of an ongoing N.C.A.A. investigation.

headline.main: Syracuse Bars Its Men’s Basketball Team From Postseason
headline.print_headline: Syracuse Decides It Will Miss Postseason
